name: Cataclysm (microman502)
description:
Multiplayer Survival game. Work with friends (or on your own, if you want) to figure out what's going on, and how to defeat the cataclysm. (Story is not in yet, however)

Launcher is windows only, and is recommended as it downloads updates automatically.

Please leave any feedback in the comments, this is pretty much my first non-jam game so i'd like to know what works and what doesn't.

https://discord.gg/cTStS9RTX7 Link to the discord if you wanna chat!
